actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should establish a long-range plan for the acquisition of essential minerals from foreign sources and report to the Congress with respect to such plan.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should submit a plan to Congress, and annually report on its implementation, to ensure that adequate supplies of minerals essential to the U.S. defense, economy, and quality of life remain available in the future.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should establish a long-range plan for the acquisition of essential minerals from foreign sources and report to the Congress with respect to such plan.
